Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Dale
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, it's slick design can easily fit in you pocket. My sister had this camera previously and I got to try it. I really liked the quality so I had to pick it up myself.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.0 Megapixels / effective 1/2.3 in. CCD
2.7 in HyperCrystal LCD approx. 230,000 dots
3x Optical Zoom plus 5x Digital Zoom/ Seamless to 15x
Amazingly slim at slightly over 1/2 inch thick
Detects a smile on the subjects face and automatically fires off three consecuti
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus Stylus 1040 10MP Ultra-Slim Digital Camera (Black)
